entry.title: 20 Watch Games - Classic Pack
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 0.99 â†’ å…è²» (å…è²» ~ USDÂ 0.99)ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

A pack of 20 mini games for you to enjoy on your Apple Watch, Apple TV or your iPhone/iPad. â—‰ Brick Puzzle Drag finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to drop. â—‰ Jewel Blitz A match 3 game style. Detonate as many gems as you can in 60s. â—‰ Gold Miner Aim on the gold while the hook swings. Tap on the screen to release the hook. â—‰ Number Puzzle Swipe to combine numbers for score. â—‰ Sudoku (6x6) Fill in all the empty squares without using the same number twice in each column, row, or box. â—‰ Bubble Shooter Tap to shoot bubble. â—‰ Find Word With 4 letters, you have 10s to find a word. If time runs out, you lose. â—‰ Color Lines Remove balls by forming lines (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) of at least five balls of the same color. Get the highscore! â—‰ Mine Sweeper Tap to reveal a square. If a square containing a mine, you lose. Reveal all square to win. â—‰ Brick Breaker Drag your finger to move your paddle and hit the ball. Destroy all the blocks to finish levels. â—‰ Maze Man Swipe to change direction, collect all things on the map but don't touch the devil! â—‰ Boxing Tap left/right to move, mid to punch.. â—‰ Crazy Tennis Feel like crazy while playing with AI. Drag your finger to move your paddle. Don't let the ball out. â—‰ Block Ninja Control the ninja to avoid all spikes and get best score. â—‰ Tappy Bird Tap the screen to fly up. Don't hit anything. â—‰ Snake Swipe to change snake direction. â—‰ Tic-Tac-Toe Challenge your brain with the AI. â—‰ Pin Hack Find the pin number before timeout. â—‰ ATM Use your math skill to give the right money request. â—‰ What Number Find the next number of a number chain. => On Apple Watch please use Digital Crown to exit game. Thanks for all your feedback!!!

åº”ç”¨æˆªå±

iPhone

iPad
